Bases: object

createIMAGE_resolve(p2evt, p2img, RA_pnt, DEC_pnt, size=1)[source]

create images from resolve :param p2evt: path to event file :param p2img: path to the output image :param RA_pnt: right ascension of the center of the image :param DEC_pnt: declination of the center of the image :param size: rescale factor to modify the standard resolve image. Default is 1. :return:

createIMAGE_xtend(p2evt, p2img, RA_pnt, DEC_pnt, size=1)[source]

create images from xtend :param p2evt: path to event file :param p2img: path to the output image :param RA_pnt: right ascension of the center of the image :param DEC_pnt: declination of the center of the image :param size: rescale factor to modify the standard xtend image. Default is 1. :return:

extractSPECTRUM_resolve(p2evt, p2spec, xmldir='$SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism')[source]

extract spectrum from resolve simulations :param p2evt: path to the event file :param p2spec: path to the output spectrum :param xmldir: directory containing response files. Default is $SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism :return:

runSIXTE_resolve(p2evt, RA_pnt, DEC_pnt, texp, xmldir='$SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism')[source]

run the simulation using resolve :param p2evt: path to the output event file :param RA_pnt: right ascension of the pointing :param DEC_pnt: declination of the pointing :param texp: exposure time :param xmldir: directory containing response files. Default is $SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism :return:

runSIXTE_resolve_attitude(p2evt, RA_pnt, DEC_pnt, texp, mjdref, xmldir='$SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism')[source]

run the simulation using resolve and an attitude file :param p2evt: path to the output event file :param RA_pnt: right ascension of the pointing :param DEC_pnt: declination of the pointing :param texp: exposure time :param mjdref: reference modified julian date, it should be the same as specified in the attitude file :param xmldir: directory containing response files. Default is $SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism :return:

runSIXTE_xtend(p2evt, RA_pnt, DEC_pnt, texp, xmldir='$SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism')[source]

run the simulation using xtend :param p2evt: path to the output event file :param RA_pnt: right ascension of the pointing :param DEC_pnt: declination of the pointing :param texp: exposure time :param xmldir: directory containing response files. Default is $SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism :return:

runSIXTE_xtend_attitude(p2evt, RA_pnt, DEC_pnt, texp, mjdref, xmldir='$SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism')[source]

run the simulation using xtend and an attitude file :param p2evt: path to the output event file :param RA_pnt: right ascension of the pointing :param DEC_pnt: declination of the pointing :param texp: exposure time :param mjdref: reference modified julian date, it should be the same as specified in the attitude file :param xmldir: directory containing response files. Default is $SIXTE/share/sixte/instruments/xrism :return:

xrism_mock.spectral_fitting module

xrism_mock.spectral_fitting.fit_Tbabs_bapec(p2spec, p2out, Emin, Emax, nH, kT, z, vel)[source]

fit spectra with a Tbabs(bapec) model :param p2spec: path to the spectrum :param p2out: path to output files :param Emin: lower energy :param Emax: higher energy :param nH: fixed galactic absorption :param kT: initial guess for temperature :param z: initial guess for redshift :param vel: initial guess for velocity :return:

xrism_mock.spectral_fitting.fit_Tbabs_bapec_bapec(p2spec, p2out, Emin, Emax, nH, kT, z, vel)[source]

fit spectra with a Tbabs(bapec + bapec) model :param p2spec: path to the spectrum :param p2out: path to output files :param Emin: lower energy :param Emax: higher energy :param nH: fixed galactic absorption :param kT: initial guess for the two temperatures :param z: initial guess for redshift :param vel: initial guess for velocity :return:
